title: What the Fight After Roe Actually Looks Like
description: Somehow, it's only been less than two months since the Supreme Court overruled Roe v. Wade with their decision in Dobbs v. Jackson Women's Health Organization. But A LOT has happened since then. To further examine the fall-out, we assembled a stellar crew to help us get the lay of the post-Roe land: journalist Rebecca Traister, health law expert Michele Goodwin, and U.S. Congressman Mondaire Jones.
author: hey@crooked.com (leah litman, kate shaw, melissa murray, rebecca traister, michele goodwin, mondaire jones)
